"The Pet Lab":
"The Pet Lab is a facility dedicated to the growth of Pets.
Each function is as follows:

\u3000\u3000- Candy Compression
\u3000\u3000\u3000Reduces the size of Pet Candy.

\u3000\u3000- Evolve Pet Rarity
\u3000\u3000\u3000Raise the rarity of Pets using the same kind and high rarity eggs.

\u3000\u3000- Pet Goods Shop
\u3000\u3000\u3000Exchange specific items to facilitate Pet growth."
